Data: Starc to Vijay, 1 run length ball on off stump and he opens his bat face to dab it wide of backward point
Starc to Rahane, no run length ball outside off and he presses forward to drive to mid-off
Starc to Rahane, no run back of a length on off stump. Rahane rides the bounce and blocks it into the off side, in front of point. Thinks of a single but decides against it
Starc to Rahane, no run full on off stump and Rahane defends to mid-off, showing the full face
Starc to Rahane, FOUR runs short and wide and Rahane flashes hard, slashing uppishly over the cordon and down to the third man boundary
Starc to Rahane, 1 run full on off stump and he comes forward to drive to mid-off
Lyon to Rahane, no run length ball on off and middle and he comes forward to defend towards short leg
Lyon to Rahane, no run back of a length, turns in towards middle stump and he goes on the back foot to block into the on side
Lyon to Rahane, FOUR runs short ball and Rahane gets on top of the bounce and pulls it away to the forward square leg boundary
Lyon to Rahane, no run tossed up on off stump and he gets forward to block it back towards the bowler
Lyon to Rahane, no run tossed up again and he comes forward to work it into the on side
Lyon to Rahane, 1 run back of a length and he goes on the back foot to tuck it away towards square leg
Starc to Rahane, no run length ball angled across, defended into the covers
Starc to Rahane, no run back of a length on a fourth-stump line, punched back towards the bowler
Starc to Rahane, no run length ball outside off, angling away, and Rahane lets it go
Starc to Rahane, no run length ball on a fourth-stump line. Rahane plays with an angled bat, way out in front of him, and gets a thick outside edge that Lyon fields, diving to his left at point
Starc to Rahane, no run full on off stump, driven towards mid-off
Starc to Rahane, no run back of a length on off stump. Rahane rises to his toes to defend into the covers
Lyon to Vijay, 2 runs tossed up outside off and Vijay gets down to lap sweep towards the fine leg boundary
Lyon to Vijay, 1 run full on off stump, driven down to long-on for the easy single
Lyon to Rahane, FOUR runs a touch short and Rahane makes room, jumping back outside leg stump to punch it away to the cover point boundary
Lyon to Rahane, 1 run back of a length and he tucks it away with the turn towards fine leg
Lyon to Vijay, 1 run on the pads and he works it away towards long leg
Lyon to Rahane, 1 run again a touch on the shorter side and he goes deep in his crease to work it backward of square
Starc to Rahane, no run short ball down the leg side. Vijay lets it go
Starc to Rahane, no run length ball on off stump, defended back to the bowler
Starc to Rahane, no run length ball on off stump. Rahane comes forward to defend towards mid-on
Starc to Rahane, no run back of a length on off stump. Rahane gets on the hop to defend with soft hands
Starc to Rahane, 1 run short ball and Rahane pulls to the man at long leg
Starc to Vijay, no run back of a length outside off, left alone
Lyon to Rahane, no run back of a length and Rahane rocks back to cut, can't beat point
Lyon to Rahane, FOUR runs tossed up outside off and Rahane is at full stretch to drive that against the turn, to the square cover boundary
Lyon to Rahane, 1 run a touch short again and Rahane pulls to the man at deepish midwicket, two-thirds of the way back
Lyon to Vijay, FOUR runs down the track now and Lyon floats it outside off, offering him room to free his arms. He uses that and swings through the line to go over the top of mid-off
Lyon to Vijay, no run a bit flatter, angled in towards off stump. Vijay presses forward and defends into the on side
Lyon to Vijay, FOUR runs sweeps now, from outside off stump, and he hits it firmly to the square leg boundary
Watson to Rahane, no run back of a length on off stump, defended into the covers
Watson to Rahane, no run back of a length again, a bit more width, and he slaps it to point
Watson to Rahane, 2 runs on the pads now and he tucks it away towards deep backward square leg
Watson to Rahane, no run length ball, angling in towards off stump, and Rahane comes forward to block into the off side
Watson to Rahane, 1 run back of a length on a fourth-stump line. Rahane shuffles across and works it into the on side, to the right of the man at short midwicket
Watson to Vijay, no run back of a length outside off and Vijay defends towards mid-off
Hazlewood to Rahane, no run length ball on a fifth-stump line, left alone
Hazlewood to Rahane, no run length ball outside off and he presses forward to defend
Hazlewood to Rahane, no run full and a bit of reverse-swing into the blockhole on off stump. Rahane does well to jam his bat down on it
Hazlewood to Rahane, no run back of a length outside off, defended into the covers
Hazlewood to Rahane, 3 runs full on the pads and it's clipped away towards the wide long-on boundary
Hazlewood to Vijay, FOUR runs short ball and that's pulled away witheringly from an off-stump line, swivels and finds the midwicket boundary
Watson to Rahane, no run back of a length outside off, left alone.
Watson to Rahane, no run
Watson to Rahane, no run full and wide, driven into the covers. Rogers dives to his right at short extra to make a good save
Watson to Rahane, 3 runs full and wide and he gets a nice big stride out to drive towards the extra cover boundary
Watson to Vijay, no run tests the middle of the pitch and it's a good one, follows Rahane, who has to sway a long way to avoid it
Watson to Vijay, no run fullish on off stump, straightens a touch. Vijay pushes at it without much footwork, gets a bit of a leading edge towards mid-off
Hazlewood to Rahane, no run length ball outside off, not full enough to drive. Rahane throws his bat at it and can't connect
Hazlewood to Rahane, no run length ball wide outside off, left alone
Hazlewood to Rahane, no run back of a length outside off, Rahane rides the bounce and punches to point
Hazlewood to Rahane, 1 run back of a length on leg stump, tucked off the hips through square leg
Hazlewood to Vijay, FOUR runs bang! That was full outside off and he cleared his front leg and walloped that between the bowler and mid-off to bring up 2000 Test runs
Hazlewood to Vijay, no run back of a length on a fourth-stump line, defended to short cover
Watson to Rahane, 3 runs short ball, and he's pulled that from head height with a tennis-style smash down towards the midwicket boundary. They get three, and Rahane reaches his half-century
Watson to Vijay, no run length ball, angling in towards middle stump. Vijay stays on the back foot to defend into the off side
Watson to Vijay, 1 run length ball on off stump, and he twirls his wrists to place it wide of the man at short midwicket
Watson to Rahane, 2 runs length ball outside off, there's enough width for Rahane to drive on the up and ease it past the man at short cover diving to his left
Watson to Rahane, no run length ball wide outside off, left alone
Watson to Rahane, no run length ball, angling in towards top of off. Rahane defends with a nice full face
Lyon to Vijay, no run full outside off, driven to mid-off
Lyon to Vijay, no run length ball on off stump and he comes forward to block it back to the bowler
Lyon to Vijay, no run length ball on the pads, tucked away towards short leg
Lyon to Vijay, no run down the track and he works his wrists to ease it towards mid-on

Lyon to Vijay, OUT ... and it's paid off. Vijay comes down the track and goes for the big hit again. Was making room to go over mid-off and it went with the angle past his outside edge and Haddin makes the easy stumping. Hang on, they've had another look at it, and there was a thin edge through to the keeper, so it's a caught behind and not a stumping.
Lyon to Rohit Sharma, no run length ball on the pads, and he goes on the back foot to tuck it away to the right of the diving short leg fielder
Watson to Rahane, no run length ball, angling in towards off stump. Rahane defends towards short midwicket
Watson to Rahane, no run full outside off and Rahane presses forward to block it back to the bowler
Watson to Rahane, no run back of a length outside off, dabbed towards point
Watson to Rahane, no run back of a length on off stump, blocked back to the bowler
Watson to Rahane, no run full outside off, driven straight to Rogers at short extra cover
Watson to Rahane, no run length ball on off stump and Rahane presses forward to defend
Lyon to Rohit Sharma, 1 run tossed up outside off and he comes forward and steers it away towards point
Lyon to Rahane, 1 run down the leg side and he sweeps firmly to the right of the man at long leg
Lyon to Rohit Sharma, no run tossed up on off stump and Rohit presses forward to block
Lyon to Rohit Sharma, no run floated up towards middle stump, a bit of drift away, and he comes forward and defends into the on side
Lyon to Rohit Sharma, 1 run sweeps a length ball and it hits the back of Rogers' helmet and lobs up towards midwicket, drops short of the fielder
Lyon to Rahane, no run length ball outside leg and he goes right back to tuck that to backward square leg
Starc to Rohit Sharma, no run back of a length on middle stump and he goes back to defend into the on side
Starc to Rohit Sharma, no run length ball on a fifth-stump line, left alone

Starc to Rohit Sharma, 1 run short ball rising up to the ribcage. Rohit rides the bounce and drops it down into the on side with soft hands, and they run the single before short midwicket could attack the ball
Starc to Rahane, no run length ball on off stump, defended to mid-off
Starc to Rahane, 1 run short, and Rahane swivels and helps it away to the deep backward square leg fielder
Starc to Rohit Sharma, no run back of a length outside off, gets on his toes and dabs it into the cover region
Lyon to Rahane, 1 run length ball on middle and leg. Rahane goes deep in his crease and works it to backward square leg. They take the single easily despite him starting on the back foot
Lyon to Rohit Sharma, no run tossed up slower on off stump and Rohit comes forward to defend back to the bowler

Lyon to Rohit Sharma, SIX runs down the track and that is one of those lazy, effortless hits that Rohit specialises in. It's on leg stump and he swings through the line and hits with the turn over wide long-on
Lyon to Rohit Sharma, FOUR runs on leg stump again and Rohit sweeps now, firmly down to the square leg boundary
Lyon to Rohit Sharma, no run better length, floated across just outside off, and he comes forward to defend back to the bowler
Lyon to Rohit Sharma, no run tossed up again, on the stumps this time, and Rohit pushes it firmly back to the bowler
Watson to Rahane, no run full on off stump, whipped to mid-on
Watson to Rahane, no run length ball, angled in towards middle stump, shows the full face to defend to mid-on

Watson to Rahane, no run appeal for lbw as Watson gets one to dart in from a fairly full length. Not given. Rahane seems to have just got his front pad outside the line. Height may have been an issue too. Haddin makes a cheeky referral gesture
Watson to Rahane, no run length ball outside off, left alone
Watson to Rahane, no run back of a length, angling in. Rahane looks to tuck it away into the leg side but it bounces a touch extra and hits him on the thigh pad
Watson to Rahane, no run fullish, angling in towards middle and off. May have straightened a touch too, and he shows the full face to defend back to the bowler
Warner to Rohit Sharma, FOUR runs shortish and wide, with a bit of outswing. Rohit cuts late to beat the man at gully
Warner to Rohit Sharma, 1 run full on middle stump, driven down the ground to long-on
Warner to Rahane, (no ball) 1 run slips out of his hand and it's a waist-high full-toss that Rahane tucks away towards deep square leg
Warner to Rohit Sharma, 1 run back of a length, angling down leg, and he glances it away towards long leg
Warner to Rahane, no run back of a length on middle and leg, defended off the back foot towards mid-on
Warner to Rahane, 1 run short ball and there's that tennis-style controlled pull from Rahane again, bat pointing up, and he keeps it down and directs it towards deep square leg
Warner to Rohit Sharma, no run length ball on off stump, defended back towards the bowler
Watson to Rahane, 1 run full outside off, angling in, and he drives with an angled bat and gets a thick inside-edge past his stumps
Watson to Rohit Sharma, no run length ball, angling in towards leg stump, clipped to wide mid-on
Watson to Rohit Sharma, 2 runs down the leg side and it's glanced to the right of the fielder at long leg
Watson to Rohit Sharma, 1 run down the leg side again, tucked away to long leg
Watson to Rahane, no run full outside off, punched to mid-off

Watson to Rahane, FOUR runs full on off and middle and Rahane simply presents the full face to punch that smoothly down the ground, between the stumps and mid-on. The Tendulkar shot without the aura of Tendulkar-ness and that little nod of the head at the end.
Smith to Rohit Sharma, no run nice flight and dip on off and middle. Rohit gets his front pad out of the line and defends into the off side
Smith to Rohit Sharma, 2 runs drops it short and Rohit is on the back foot in a flash to pull it to the wide long-on region
Smith to Rohit Sharma, 1 run short again, width too, and Rohit reaches for it to slap it to sweeper cover
Smith to Rahane, no run flighted full-toss on middle stump, pushed carefully to mid-off
Smith to Rahane, 1 run back of a length on leg stump and he goes on the back foot to work it away backward of square
Smith to Rohit Sharma, no run nice length on leg stump and Rohit defends into the on side
Johnson to Rahane, no run starts by swinging one slightly down the leg side. Rahane can't quite connect with the flick and it runs off the outside of his pad towards the keeper
Johnson to Rahane, no run back of a length on middle stump and he goes back and across to defend
Johnson to Rahane, FOUR runs very full outside off, and Rahane jams his bat down on it and it bounces over the leaping point fielder and races away to the boundary
Johnson to Rahane, no run back of a length, swinging in towards the top of middle stump, and Rahane hops to defend into the off side
Johnson to Rahane, 2 runs on the pads now and it's tucked away to long leg. Rahane ran the first one really quick
Johnson to Rahane, FOUR runs full and wide and Rahane gets down on one knee and slaps it away to the cover point boundary
Hazlewood to Rohit Sharma, no run length ball outside off, a hint of outswing, left alone
Hazlewood to Rohit Sharma, no run back of a length, angling in towards middle stump. Rohit lets it come on and tucks it away towards square leg
Watson to Rohit Sharma, no run on the pads, tucked away to square leg
Watson to Rohit Sharma, no run fullish, wide outside off. Rohit leaves it alone
Watson to Rohit Sharma, no run lovely delivery from Watto. It's a gentle outswinger outside off and it beats Rohit's outside edge as he comes forward to drive on the up through cover
Watson to Rohit Sharma, no run full on off and middle, clipped to mid-on
Johnson to Rahane, 1 run short ball down the leg side and Rahane swivels and helps it round towards fine leg
Johnson to Rohit Sharma, no run good leave from Rohit. That was angling towards his off stump but he left on length, knowing it wasn't full enough to hit the stumps. Passed over the top of off
Johnson to Rohit Sharma, 1 run back of a length on the stumps and Rohit tucks it off his hips towards backward square leg
Johnson to Rahane, no run short, down the leg side, and Rahane can't connect with the tuck off the hips
Johnson to Rahane, 1 run back of a length on off stump. Rahane rides the bounce and dabs it away in front of point
Johnson to Rohit Sharma, no run full on off stump, driven to mid-off
Hazlewood to Rahane, no run full, wide outswinger. Left alone
Hazlewood to Rahane, 1 run length ball now, a little closer to off stump, and Rahane is on his way with a push into the covers off the front foot
Hazlewood to Rohit Sharma, no run nice full length, angling in towards off stump and tailing away just a touch. Rohit lets it come on and opens his bat face to play that towards backward point
Hazlewood to Rohit Sharma, no run again, it's an outswinger on a good length just outside off. Rohit lets it run off the face of his bat towards the man at backward point
Hazlewood to Rohit Sharma, no run a little wider now and Rohit lets it go
Hazlewood to Rohit Sharma, no run good length again, a bit of swing away. He's been noticeably fuller this over, and Rohit defends off the front foot into the covers
Johnson to Rahane, no run nice full length again, angling across into a fourth-stump line. Rahane defends into the off side
Johnson to Rahane, no run down the leg side now, a bit of inswing but not quite directed where he would have wanted it. Rahane lets it go through to the keeper
Johnson to Rahane, no run bit of a muted caught-behind appeal from the keeper as Rahane chases a full, wide ball. Looked like his bat hit the ground and the ball passed over it
Johnson to Rahane, 1 run a bit of inswing now, towards middle stump. Rahane jams his bat down quickly and it goes off the inside edge towards square leg
Johnson to Rohit Sharma, no run well-directed short ball. Rohit sways away from the line
Johnson to Rohit Sharma, FOUR runs full and wide and Rohit comes forward to drive with an open face to the backward point boundary. Sliced that a bit but got four runs for it
Hazlewood to Rahane, no run wide outswinger, on a sixth-stump line. Left alone
Hazlewood to Rahane, no run shortish, rising ball outside off. Rahane gets on his toes and plays it down towards point
Hazlewood to Rahane, FOUR runs overpitched now, and Rahane gets down low, head over the ball, to drive to the square cover boundary

Hazlewood to Rahane, OUT that is the best ball of the Test match. Lovely length, caught Rahane on the crease, angling in towards off stump and curling away late. Rahane had to play at it, and it kissed his edge through to Haddin, who takes his fifth catch of the innings
Hazlewood to Dhoni, no run length ball, swings away from fairly wide outside off. Dhoni leaves it alone
Hazlewood to Dhoni, no run bouncer, and it climbs sharply over off stump as Dhoni pulls his head out of the line in a hurry
Johnson to Rohit Sharma, no run length ball, angling across towards the top of off stump. Rohit defends into the off side
Johnson to Rohit Sharma, no run full, wider this time, and Rohit leaves
Johnson to Rohit Sharma, no run nice full length on a fourth-stump line. Rohit gets a solid stride out to defend towards mid-off
Johnson to Rohit Sharma, no run this one's a touch wider and Rohit leaves it safely
Johnson to Rohit Sharma, no run back of a length this time, angling towards off stump. Rohit rides the bounce and defends into the on side
Johnson to Rohit Sharma, no run back of a length again, a touch straighter, and Rohit carefully tucks it towards short midwicket
Hazlewood to Dhoni, no run full on a fourth-stump line, shapes away late. Dhoni plays it towards backward point, hands pushing at the ball with feet going nowhere
Hazlewood to Dhoni, no run straighter now, angling in towards off and middle. Dhoni defends towards short midwicket
Hazlewood to Dhoni, no run full on off stump, swings away a touch. Dhoni shuffles across and defends into the off side
Hazlewood to Dhoni, no run short ball, and Dhoni drops his hands and lets it hit him on the left bicep
Hazlewood to Dhoni, no run short again, this one's outside off, and Dhoni lets it go through to the keeper
Hazlewood to Dhoni, no run length ball, angling in towards off stump. Dhoni defends to mid-on
Johnson to Rohit Sharma, no run dug in short, and Rohit sways out of line
Johnson to Rohit Sharma, 1 run angled across towards off stump, pitched up. Rohit isn't quite in position for the drive, bat comes down at an angle, and it goes off the inside edge into the leg side
Johnson to Dhoni, no run full outside off, left alone. Dhoni's feet simply didn't move there

Johnson to Dhoni, no run big appeal for lbw, not given. It was quite full, with a hint of inward movement, but I'm not sure that didn't pitch outside leg. Ooh, the pitch mat says it did pitch in line, and it was full, and it trapped Dhoni on the crease. But Hawkeye says it was going over the stumps nonetheless
Johnson to Dhoni, no run wider this time and Dhoni lets it go

Johnson to Dhoni, no run there's the short ball and Dhoni walks across his stumps it hits him on the back. It ricocheted towards fine leg, and the batsmen ran what they thought was a leg-bye, but the umpire signalled dead ball. That is a big call for the umpire, and Dhoni has a few words with him. Usually, you get leg byes for evasive action
Hazlewood to Rohit Sharma, no run full, on a fifth-stump line, left alone
Hazlewood to Rohit Sharma, 1 run full, closer to off stump, and Rohit comes forward and defends with soft hands, to the left of short cover
Hazlewood to Dhoni, 1 run full again, angling in towards off and middle. Dhoni nudges it into the leg side, played that without really coming forward
Hazlewood to Rohit Sharma, no run outswinger on a good length outside off. Rohit looks to leave, but he makes the decision late and the ball hits bat on its way up and bounces through to first slip
Hazlewood to Rohit Sharma, no run bouncer, Rohit ducks low under it
Hazlewood to Rohit Sharma, no run full and wide, swinging away. Rohit lets it go
Johnson to Dhoni, no run back of a length wide outside off. Dhoni leaves it alone
Johnson to Dhoni, no run length ball angling across and he goes hard at it, looking to hit through the off side, and fails to connect
Johnson to Dhoni, no run back of a length, angling across, and Dhoni pokes and misses
Johnson to Dhoni, no run length ball, probing away outside off. This time Dhoni lets it go through
Johnson to Dhoni, no run full on middle and off, defended towards mid-off

Johnson to Dhoni, FOUR runs looks to bowl that wide tempter again but this one's overpitched and Dhoni gets his head over it to drive. It rolls to the cover point boundary, keeping Lyon interested all the way as he chased from backward point
Watson to Rohit Sharma, no run full, wide outswinger. Left alone

Watson to Rohit Sharma, OUT got him, Smith's taken a beauty! Watson's struck with a good ball, but Rohit will wonder if he needed to play that shot. It was the wide outswinger, not quite up there for the drive. Rohit drove on the up, it curled away and took his outside edge, and Smith took a super catch diving low to his right at second slip
Watson to Ashwin, no run angles this in towards middle, and it's curling away gently as well. Ashwin defends with a straight bat towards mid-on
Watson to Ashwin, no run back of a length outside off, left alone
Watson to Ashwin, no run a touch short, a bit of width. Ashwin steers it to point
Watson to Ashwin, no run full on off stump, clipped to mid-on
Johnson to Dhoni, 1 run another short ball, this time Dhoni pulls it round to deep backward square leg
Johnson to Ashwin, no run back of a length on off stump. Ashwin gets on his toes to defend towards point
Johnson to Ashwin, no run back of a length outside off, punched to extra cover
Johnson to Ashwin, 1 leg bye down the leg side. Ashwin can't quite connect with the flick and it runs off his thigh to the left of the keeper
Johnson to Dhoni, 3 runs full outside off and Dhoni throws his hands at it and drives it through square cover. Was full enough for him to be able to do that
Johnson to Ashwin, 3 runs lovely, lovely shot. That's a length ball on a fourth-stump line and he simply stands there and eases it through the covers
Watson to Ashwin, FOUR runs full and wide and Ashwin looks for the drive through square cover. Again he gets it to shape away and the batsman ends up slicing it wide of gully
Watson to Ashwin, no run full outside off and Ashwin drives straight. Watson bends in his follow-through to stop that with his left hand
Watson to Ashwin, no run length ball on middle and off. Ashwin shuffles across and tucks that towards short midwicket
Watson to Ashwin, no run back of a length wide outside off, left alone
Watson to Ashwin, no run a little fuller, still just as wide, and Ashwin leaves again
Watson to Ashwin, no run length ball, angling in towards off stump. Ashwin defends it back to Watson
Starc to Dhoni, no run length ball angling away from off stump, a bit of shape in. Dhoni walks out of his crease, across his stumps, and lets it hit him near the midriff
Starc to Dhoni, no run full, swings down the leg side now
Starc to Dhoni, no run length ball on a fifth-stump line, holds its line and Dhoni allows it to sail through to the keeper
Starc to Dhoni, FOUR runs short, and Dhoni pulls it from outside off stump. Picked it up very early and hit it to the straight midwicket boundary
Starc to Dhoni, FOUR runs full and wide and Dhoni climbs into it, walking out of his crease and bringing his bottom hand into play to smash that between the stumps and mid-off
Starc to Dhoni, no run good ball, quick, on a good length, angling across Dhoni. He pushes at it without moving his feet and the ball beats his outside edge
Watson to Ashwin, no run back of a length wide of off stump. Ashwin waves his bat at it and steers it to point
Watson to Ashwin, no run length ball outside off. Ashwin punches to short extra cover, shuffling across rather than moving forward towards the ball
Watson to Ashwin, 2 runs short and Ashwin pulls it away to the right of Rogers at short midwicket
Watson to Ashwin, no run fuller now, but wide enough for Ashwin to leave with ease
Watson to Ashwin, no run full outswinger on off stump, driven to mid-off
Watson to Ashwin, no run back of a length outside off, punched to short extra cover
Starc to Dhoni, no run Dhoni walks out of his crease and outside off. Starc bowls it full outside off and he clips it into the on side
Starc to Dhoni, 1 run back of a length now and Dhoni jumps across to dab it wide of backward point
Starc to Ashwin, no run full, angling across. Ashwin looks to drive through cover, gets a thickish inside edge into the leg side
Starc to Ashwin, FOUR runs short and wide and Ashwin picks it up very early and slaps it over the man at short cover
Starc to Ashwin, FOUR runs full on off stump and Ashwin clips it away to the midwicket boundary, super timing
Starc to Ashwin, no run back of a length outside off, punches with a high left elbow to short cover
Watson to Dhoni, 1 run out of his crease again, gets outside the line of off stump, and works the full ball to the right of the short midwicket fielder
Watson to Ashwin, 1 run angles this into the pads and Ashwin plays that clip again. This time, Rogers is fielding two-thirds of the way to the midwicket boundary and it's kept down to two runs
Watson to Dhoni, no run length ball outside off. Dhoni shuffles across and dabs it to backward point
Watson to Dhoni, no run bouncer, and Dhoni gets into a semi-duck under it
Watson to Dhoni, no run full outside off, left alone after an extravagant shuffle across
Watson to Dhoni, 2 runs length ball outside off and Dhoni shuffles so far across that he's able to tuck this away towards fine leg
Starc to Ashwin, 1 run short, rising ball down the leg side. Ashwin swivels and pulls it towards deep backward square leg
Starc to Dhoni, 1 run short again, not as short as the previous one, gets up to about chest height, and Dhoni pulls it to deep backward square leg
Starc to Ashwin, 2 runs back of a length outside off, and Ashwin stands tall and eases it away behind point with an open bat face
Starc to Ashwin, 1 wide this one's dug in very short and Ashwin leans away and watches it through to the keeper
Starc to Ashwin, no run another bouncer. Ashwin ducks this time
Starc to Ashwin, 1 wide short, wide outside off, left alone again. Erasmus signals wide
Starc to Ashwin, FOUR runs on the pads and Ashwin flicks it away once again. Rogers was in that two-thirds forward square leg but it flew away very quickly to his left
Starc to Ashwin, no run back of a length outside off, defended off the back foot
Lyon to Dhoni, no run back of a length on leg stump. Dhoni goes on the back foot and works it to the man at backward square leg
Lyon to Dhoni, no run a bit of air now and Dhoni is down the track to tuck it to short midwicket
Lyon to Dhoni, 1 run goes on the back foot, looks to make room but it turns in and cramps him. He clubs it down to long-on - more a deep mid-on - for the single
Lyon to Ashwin, no run back of a length on leg stump and he goes deep in his crease to play that down to the right of short leg
Lyon to Ashwin, no run fuller now and he comes forward to defend towards short leg
Lyon to Ashwin, no run down the leg side now and he goes back and tucks it to short leg
Hazlewood to Dhoni, 1 run sees Dhoni walking across and bowls it full on middle and leg. He works it away through square leg
Hazlewood to Ashwin, FOUR runs back of a length, wide outside off. Ashwin goes at it with an angled bat without any footwork and it flies off the outside edge between gully and backward point
Hazlewood to Ashwin, FOUR runs full on middle stump and there's the Ashwin flick again, screams away through straight midwicket
Hazlewood to Ashwin, no run fullish outside off, left alone
Hazlewood to Ashwin, no run back of a length outside off, defended to short extra cover
Hazlewood to Ashwin, no run full on middle and off, driven to the fielder at short mid-on
Lyon to Dhoni, no run tossed up on middle and leg, defended wristily into the on side
Lyon to Dhoni, no run down the track now, and he nurdles it away to the right of short leg
Lyon to Dhoni, no run length ball on leg stump and he goes deep in his crease to work it to backward square leg

Lyon to Dhoni, no run goes back to a length ball again, this one was flatter and quicker, and it turned sharply and smacked him on the pad. Bit of inside edge on it as he hurriedly tried to work it leg side
Lyon to Dhoni, no run a touch shorter and he goes back and tucks it away to backward square leg
Lyon to Dhoni, no run quicker now and he plays from the crease, works it to the same fielder at backward square leg
Hazlewood to Ashwin, no run length ball outside off, left alone
Hazlewood to Ashwin, 2 runs back of a length, cuts in from outside off as Ashwin looks to punch through the covers and the inside edge narrowly misses off stump

Hazlewood to Ashwin, OUT got him! That was a beautiful length outside off, a bit of movement away off the pitch. Ashwin's bat comes down at an angle as he looks for the drive, and Watson takes a waist-high catch at first slip
Hazlewood to Yadav, no run length ball, angling in towards off stump, defended into the covers
Hazlewood to Yadav, no run length ball, a bit of shape in towards off stump. Umesh goes on the back foot to punch that into the covers
Hazlewood to Yadav, no run back of a length outside off, Umesh lets it go through to the keeper
Lyon to Dhoni, 2 runs back of a length, and he goes back and tucks it away fine. The man at backward square leg is fairly square, and he has to put in the slide to pull it back inside the rope
Lyon to Dhoni, FOUR runs out comes the reverse-sweep. Gets into position early and slaps it away to the backward point boundary
Lyon to Dhoni, no run full outside leg and he gets a big stride out to defend. Turns past his inside edge and hits his pad
Lyon to Dhoni, no run pushed through a bit quicker, not much turn. Dhoni goes deep in his crease to defend
Lyon to Dhoni, no run floated up towards middle and off and he comes forward a long way to defend, doesn't get to the pitch and it turns and hits his pad
Lyon to Dhoni, 1 run down the track now, clipped away wristily to long-on
Hazlewood to Dhoni, 2 runs short, and Dhoni swings his entire body around into the pull. Johnson does well to slide to his left at long leg and make the stop

Hazlewood to Dhoni, OUT that's five on debut! A bit of inward movement from a good length. Dhoni was looking to leave, made the decision late, and the ball clipped his inside edge as the bat went up and Haddin takes a sixth catch
Hazlewood to Aaron, no run looks for the bouncer, but it's too far outside off to trouble Aaron
Hazlewood to Aaron, no run length ball outside off. Aaron gets a thick edge looking to drive on the up and the ball drops short of Shaun Marsh at third slip
Hazlewood to Aaron, no run full, angling in towards middle stump, punched to mid-off
Hazlewood to Aaron, no run short ball., Aaron looks to pull without getting behind the line and can't connect
Lyon to Yadav, no run length ball on leg stump, defended towards short leg
Lyon to Yadav, no run tossed up outside leg, defended to short leg off the front foot
Lyon to Yadav, FOUR runs down the leg side now and Umesh frees his arms to sweep, beats long leg to his right
Lyon to Yadav, no run tossed up, angled across towards off stump, blocked towards short mid-on
Lyon to Yadav, 1 run down the track now and goes for the big slog. Ends up hitting it squarer than intended and deep backward square leg runs to his right to make the stop
Lyon to Aaron, no run nice flight outside off and Aaron presses forward into a solid-looking defensive shot
Hazlewood to Yadav, no run looks to clear his front leg and smash the full, wide ball over Hazlewood's head. Ends up hitting it into the ground and it rolls back to the bowler
Hazlewood to Yadav, FOUR runs short ball and it was onto Umesh very quickly. He was halfway through his pull and he top-edged it over the keeper's head
Hazlewood to Yadav, no run length ball outside off, moves away a touch and beats Umesh's no-footwork poke
Hazlewood to Yadav, no run back of a length wide outside off. Umesh throws his bat at it and fails to connect
Hazlewood to Yadav, no run good bouncer, follows Umesh, who hurriedly gets out of the way and ducks, taking his eye off the ball
Hazlewood to Yadav, no run full on leg stump, driven to the left of mid-on, who makes a tumbling stop
Lyon to Aaron, 2 runs down the track and that is a gorgeous shot. It was tossed up quite wide and he eased it into the gap between cover and mid-off
Lyon to Aaron, no run dropped. Comes forward to defend as this dips and spins in from outside off. Gets a thick outside edge and it bounces off Haddin's gloves
Lyon to Aaron, 2 runs down the track now and there's the big mow over mid-on. Miscued, falls well short of the boundary
Lyon to Aaron, no run tossed up outside off, presses forward to defend
Lyon to Aaron, no run down the track again, gets too close to the pitch of the ball and ends up jabbing it to short mid-on

Lyon to Aaron, OUT that's a stunner at short leg! Classic offie's dismissal, loop and dip, turn and bounce from outside off as he pushes forward to defend. Pops up into the leg side, and the substitute fielder at short leg, Marnus Labuschagne, moves in in a flash and dives forward to take it with his right hand, inches off the ground. I'm not sure whether it was bat-pad or bat tucked
Johnson to Yadav, no run full, very wide outside off. Umesh leaves it alone. Didn't really have a choice there
Johnson to Yadav, no run back of a length on middle stump, defended into the off side without too much footwork.
Johnson to Yadav, no run full and wide and he goes for the big drive and can't connect
Johnson to Yadav, no run short now, on an off-stump line, and Umesh hurriedly spins away from the line
Johnson to Yadav, no run full and wide again, left alone
Johnson to Yadav, no run length ball outside off, and it beats Umesh's hesitant poke
Lyon to Sharma, no run full on middle and leg, tucked away to the right of short leg
Lyon to Sharma, no run tossed up wide outside off and Ishant puts that long reach to use and defends solidly
Lyon to Sharma, 1 run full, angled in towards the pads, clipped away past short leg
Lyon to Yadav, OUT And that is that. Umesh goes for the slog-sweep from outside off, and he picks out Rogers at deep midwicket

12.11pm Lunch, and Australia will feel much better than they did at the start of the day's play. Hazlewood bowled quite beautifully to finish with a five-for, and he looked like taking wickets whenever he hit that right length. India's seamers will have watched that, but will they be able to bowl in those right areas? If they do, they could put Australia under pressure, considering they have
around the wicket now
Yadav to Johnson, no run dug in short, Johnson ducks underneath
Yadav to Johnson, 2 runs back of a length on middle stump, and Johnson whips it away through midwicket
Yadav to Johnson, no run bouncer, rises over shoulder height outside off. Johnson goes for the hook, can't connect
Yadav to Johnson, no run back of a length, angling in and rising over off stump. Johnson gets on his toes to defend
Yadav to Johnson, 1 run short, angles down the leg side. Johnson pulls it away to long leg, where Aaron has a bit of a fumble
Yadav to Smith, no run moves across his crease to pull, wasn't short enough, and it goes under his bat and strikes him on the thigh
Sharma to Johnson, (no ball) 2 runs back of a length on off stump, and Johnson punches it through the vacant mid-off region. Aaand it's another no-ball
Sharma to Johnson, FOUR runs short, down the leg side, pulled powerfully to the right of the long leg fielder, who didn't have much ground to cover but had no chance of stopping that
Sharma to Johnson, FOUR runs another short ball, doesn't rise that much, Johnson pulls from outside off and finds the midwicket boundary
Sharma to Johnson, 1 run this one's a better bouncer, gets up to head height, and Johnson hooks uppishly, and the ball falls just short of deep square leg
Sharma to Smith, no run fullish on off stump, and Smith shuffles across to defend. Straightens a touch and goes off the outside half of his bat towards gully
Sharma to Smith, no run beauty. Angles it in from wide of a crease, hits that in-between length and Smith is again caught on the shuffle. Ball straightens and beats his outside edge
Sharma to Smith, 2 runs too full, too straight. Errs in line looking for the lbw ball, and Smith clips it away towards long leg
Yadav to Johnson, 1 run short ball, again rises to an amiable height, and Johnson pulls it away to deep backward square leg
Yadav to Smith, no run back of a length on a fourth-stump line. Smith jumps across to defend
Yadav to Smith, 1 run short and wide and Rahane does very well at gully to dive to his left and stop that open-faced steer from Smith
Yadav to Johnson, no run short again, slants it down the leg side
Yadav to Johnson, no run length ball on a fourth-stump line. Johnson plays a defensive punch off the back foot, down the ground to the right of mid-on
Yadav to Johnson, no run nice length, angling in towards a fourth-stump line and straightening after pitching. Johnson pushes at it with no footwork and the ball beats his outside edge
Sharma to Smith, no run full outside off, driven back past the bowler to mid-off
Sharma to Smith, 1 run fullish, angling in towards middle stump, and he shuffles across to work it towards midwicket

Sharma to Johnson, (no ball) FOUR runs short and wide and Johnson opens his bat face and simply helps it over the top of the slips. Almost hits that for six, fell just short of the rope. And what's more, that's another no-ball
Sharma to Johnson, no run another bouncer. Johnson gets into a low crouch under it
Sharma to Johnson, 3 runs back of a length on off stump and Johnson gets on his toes to punch it away through point
Sharma to Smith, no run full outside off, driven without any footwork to point
Sharma to Smith, 2 runs full on leg stump, clipped away to the left of the man at deep backward square leg
Yadav to Johnson, no run this is the stuff. Length ball, angling across. Johnson is stuck on the crease, feet going nowhere. Pushes at it and the ball beats his outside edge
Yadav to Johnson, 1 run too straight now and Johnson clips it away through midwicket
Yadav to Smith, no run shortish outside off. Not wide enough for that slash and the ball bounces over his edge
Yadav to Smith, 1 run full on leg stump, driven to the right of mid-on
Yadav to Johnson, 1 run length ball on off stump, Johnson comes forward and pushes it wide of short cover
Yadav to Smith, 1 leg bye too straight again, angling down leg. Smith shuffles across to work it away through the leg side, and can't quite connect. Off his thigh pad towards long leg
Ashwin to Smith, 1 run down the track first ball and Ashwin angles it full and flat into his feet. Whips it down to long-on
Ashwin to Johnson, 1 run flat, angling in towards leg stump. Johnson goes on the back foot and tucks it away towards square leg
Ashwin to Smith, no run tossed up outside off and Smith presses forward to defend into the off side
Ashwin to Smith, no run tossed up again, angled in towards off stump. Smith defends off the front foot

Ashwin to Smith, FOUR runs oh, glorious. Smith comes down the track and that isn't a bad ball, tossed up to urge Smith to drive through the off side. Smith takes the invitation and drills it into the gap between mid-off and cover
Ashwin to Smith, no run lbw appeal as Ashwin finds sharp turn from outside off to ping Smith on the pads as he shuffles back and across to defend. Struck him outside the line, I think

Yadav to Johnson, FOUR runs full on off stump and Johnson punches down the ground with the full face showing. Didn't move his feet, didn't need to, and Smith jumps over the ball at the non-striker's end and it speeds away to the left of mid-off
Yadav to Johnson, no run shortish, pulled to square leg
Yadav to Johnson, no run full and wide and Johnson reaches out to drive to mid-off

Yadav to Johnson, FOUR runs good length, angling across towards middle and off and moving away a little further off the seam. Johnson pushes hard at the ball to defend and the outside edge runs away wide of second slip
Yadav to Johnson, FOUR runs short and wide, slashed away over the point region. Terrible delivery
Yadav to Johnson, no run low full-toss on off stump, punched to mid-off
Ashwin to Smith, 1 run down the track, and he whips it from outside off down to long-on
Ashwin to Johnson, no run tossed up outside off, left alone
Ashwin to Johnson, no run a little closer to off stump now and Johnson comes forward, lets it turn, and defends with soft hands past slip
Ashwin to Johnson, no run length ball outside off. Johnson is half-forward to push that into the covers
Ashwin to Johnson, no run more topspin on this one, flighted outside off, and Johnson leaves it alone
Ashwin to Johnson, 1 run shorter now and he goes on the back foot to work it away through midwicket
Aaron to Johnson, FOUR runs full and wide, and Johnson reaches out and slices that drive uppishly to the backward point boundary

Aaron to Johnson, FOUR runs full again, this is straighter, and Johnson gives himself room, exposes all three stumps, and absolutely powers that down the ground, between the stumps and the non-striker, and gets to his fifty in 37 balls

Aaron to Johnson, FOUR runs length ball on off stump and Johnson makes room once again, and simply whacks that down the ground, stands tall and clubs it back past the bowler, and Dhoni runs up to have a word with Aaron
Aaron to Johnson, no run aaaaand there's the bouncer. Johnson ducks safely under it
Aaron to Johnson, 1 run back of a length on a fourth-stump line, and Johnson makes room to club that hard to mid-off, where Umesh misfields
Aaron to Smith, 1 run length ball outside off, a tiny bit of shape in, and it isn't short enough for the back foot punch. Smith inside-edges it past his off stump
Ashwin to Smith, 1 run out of his crease and he flicks it away through square leg. Wants a second, and Johnson wisely sends him back
Ashwin to Johnson, no run slow, but back of a length outside off. Johnson goes on the back foot to defend into the covers
Ashwin to Johnson, no run angled in this time, fuller. Johnson stays back again and defends carefully
Ashwin to Johnson, no run angled in towards off stump. Johnson is on the back foot again to block into the covers
Ashwin to Johnson, SIX runs tossed up wide outside off and Johnson welcomes the room to swing his arms smoothly and launch it back over Ashwin's head and over the long-on boundary
Ashwin to Johnson, no run length ball on off stump. Johnson presses forward to defend
Aaron to Smith, 1 run back of a length on leg stump and he shuffles across and moves to 99 with a clipped single to square leg
Aaron to Johnson, (no ball) 1 run short ball and Johnson makes room to slash. Gets a top-edge that bounces down to that fielder at fine third man
Aaron to Smith, no run back of a length outside off, defended to point off the back foot

Aaron to Smith, FOUR runs short and wide and that is Smith's century. Simply eases that cut to the left of the man at point. Takes his helmet off and almost wrenches his shoulder out of its socket with the celebratory whip of his bat. Terrific innings in his first Test as captain
Aaron to Smith, no run back of a length on a fourth-stump line, left alone
Aaron to Smith, 1 run short and wide again, this time he steers it straight to backward point, who's standing deep enough to allow the single
Aaron to Johnson, no run banged in short, Johnson ducks
Ashwin to Smith, 1 run back of a length on middle stump. Smith shuffles across and nudges it away to backward square leg
Ashwin to Johnson, no run length ball going with the angle towards off stump. Johnson defends off the back foot
Ashwin to Johnson, no run tossed up outside off and he comes forward to defend
Ashwin to Johnson, no run back of a length again, on off stump, and Johnson goes deep in his crease to defend
Ashwin to Johnson, FOUR runs down the track comes Johnson, and he gets to the pitch and chips it elegantly over the bowler, to the left of mid-off
Ashwin to Johnson, no run quicker and flatter. Johnson comes forward and blocks into the off side
Aaron to Smith, FOUR runs short, not too much width, but Smith doesn't really need that. He rides the bounce and simply taps down on the ball to send it racing away to the left of gully
Aaron to Smith, no run short and wide, and he chops it to the right of gully, and Rahane makes a diving stop
Aaron to Smith, no run fuller now, angling in towards off stump. Smith shuffles across to defend
Aaron to Smith, 1 run back of a length outside off, punched to the left of short cover
Aaron to Johnson, 1 run full, angling in towards off stump, and he shuffles across and clips it away towards deep backward square leg
Aaron to Smith, no run full, a bit of shape in towards off and middle, and Smith blocks it back to the bowler
Ashwin to Johnson, no run tossed up, angling in towards middle and off, pushed back down the ground
Ashwin to Johnson, no run fairly full still, but Johnson goes on the back foot to defend
Ashwin to Johnson, no run angling in to middle now and he goes back and plays it towards short midwicket
Ashwin to Johnson, no run back of a length on off stump, punched back to the bowler
Ashwin to Johnson, no run fuller, slanting in towards middle and leg, defended off the back foot into the on side
Ashwin to Johnson, no run this one goes with the angle towards middle stump. Johnson stays inside the line and defends into the off side
Rohit Sharma to Smith, no run tossed up outside off, and Smith presses forward to defend
Rohit Sharma to Smith, 1 run a bit of loop again outside off, and he comes forward to dab it away towards point
Rohit Sharma to Johnson, no run full on middle stump, clipped gently to short leg
Rohit Sharma to Johnson, no run stays back to a pitched-up ball angling in towards leg stump. Defends down the pitch
Rohit Sharma to Johnson, 1 run tossed up on off stump, Johnson plays a checked drive down to long-off
Rohit Sharma to Smith, no run shortish outside off, and Smith goes back and punches it down the ground, towards mid-on
Ashwin to Johnson, no run back of a length on middle and off, and he goes back to block into the on side
Ashwin to Johnson, no run length ball on middle and off, and he defends off the back foot
Ashwin to Johnson, no run fires it in quicker, ends up sliding down the leg side
Ashwin to Johnson, no run a bit of loop outside off, left alone
Ashwin to Johnson, 1 run a little fuller and closer to off and he comes forward to push down to long-off
Ashwin to Smith, no run down the track, clips it from off stump towards short midwicket
Rohit Sharma to Johnson, 1 run length ball, angling in towards off stump, no turn. Johnson makes room and slaps it into the covers
Rohit Sharma to Smith, 1 run down the track, whipped down to long-on
Rohit Sharma to Johnson, 1 run on the pads now, tucked away for a single down to long leg
Rohit Sharma to Smith, 1 run floated up towards off stump and Smith plays for turn, looking to work it leg side, and it goes with the angle and off the outside edge into the off side
Rohit Sharma to Johnson, no run back of a length on middle stump, punched off the back foot, back to the bowler
Rohit Sharma to Johnson, FOUR runs down the track comes Johnson, and he hits that so well that it beats long-off, diving to his right on the boundary
Ashwin to Smith, no run down the track, doesn't quite reach the pitch of this ball on off stump, and stretches out to defend towards mid-off
Ashwin to Smith, 2 runs out of his crease again, and now he whips wristily down to deep square leg
Ashwin to Smith, no run back of a length now, on off stump, shuffles across and tucks it down to short leg
Ashwin to Smith, no run tossed up a bit more outside off and he presses forward to defend into the off side
Ashwin to Smith, 3 runs short, extremely wide, Smith reaches across and slaps it towards the cover boundary
Ashwin to Johnson, no run length ball on leg stump. Johnson goes back to defend into the on side
Yadav to Smith, 3 runs full and wide, a bit of outswing. Smith eases the drive into the covers
Yadav to Johnson, no run length ball slanted across into a fifth-stump line, left alone
Yadav to Johnson, 1 run length ball angling across towards middle and off. Johnson pushes at it with no footwork and the ball moves away a touch to take his outside edge, runs away wide of third slip
Yadav to Smith, no run full outswinger outside off, left alone
Yadav to Smith, no run swerves away again from a fourth-stump line. Smith leaves again
Yadav to Smith, no run length ball, angles in towards the fourth stump and leaves Smith, who in turn leaves the ball
Sharma to Johnson, no run length ball on a fifth-stump line. Left alone
Sharma to Johnson, 1 run full, slanting away from Johnson, who throws his bat at it. The thick edge flies over gully and nearly carries to the third man fielder
Sharma to Smith, no run fullish, angling in towards off stump. Smith shuffles across and blocks into the off side
Sharma to Smith, no run quite full again, angling in towards middle stump. Smith walks across and clips it to short midwicket
Sharma to Smith, 2 runs full on leg stump, clipped away through square leg
Sharma to Smith, no run back of a length outside off, Smith leaves it alone
Yadav to Johnson, no run back of a length, a bit of shape in towards leg stump. Johnson defends towards short midwicket

Yadav to Johnson, FOUR runs oh my. Johnson slogged at this length ball that was angling across him and ended up top-edging it. Ishant was three-fourths of the way back at third man, and he was late in moving back, and by the time he could turn around the ball had cleared him
Yadav to Johnson, no run a bit of swing in from outside off, beats Johnson's inside edge as he pushes at it away from his body
Yadav to Johnson, 1 run back of a length, too straight, and he tucks it away off his hips towards long leg
Yadav to Smith, no run back of a length on a fourth-stump line. Smith leaves again
Yadav to Smith, no run wider now and it's an easier leave for Smith
Sharma to Johnson, no run length ball wide outside off stump, too wide to make Johnson play
Sharma to Johnson, no run on off stump now and Johnson punches it back to the bowler
Sharma to Johnson, no run back of a length, slanted away wide of off stump. Goes after it and can't connect
Sharma to Johnson, no run full and wide. Another swing and miss from Johnson
Sharma to Johnson, no run back of a length, fourth stump, slanting away further. Johnson pokes and misses. His feet are glued to the spot
Sharma to Johnson, no run another play and miss. A little fuller, and again the angled bat away from the body
Yadav to Smith, 2 runs a bit of width outside off and its's slapped away through cover
Yadav to Smith, no run length ball, a bit of movement away outside off. Smith leaves it alone
Yadav to Smith, no run length ball outside off, punched into the covers
Yadav to Smith, no run back of a length on a fourth-stump line. Smith hops across to defend into the covers
Yadav to Smith, no run angled into the pads, and he tucks it away to short midwicket
Yadav to Smith, no run full on off stump, driven to mid-on
Sharma to Johnson, no run back of a length, angling across Johnson. This time he leaves it alone
Sharma to Johnson, no run fuller, wider, easier leave for Johnson
Sharma to Johnson, no run full outside off. Johnson has a go and the angle beats him again
Sharma to Johnson, FOUR runs full on the pads now, and that relieves the pressure on Johnson, who plays a good-looking clip to the midwicket boundary
Sharma to Johnson, 2 runs back to the line outside off and Johnson this time connects with the big swish away from his body, hits it uppishly over the covers
Sharma to Johnson, no run Johnson shaped to make room, and Ishant speared it full and extremely wide outside off. No way he could play a shot at that
Aaron to Smith, no run back of a length, slants it down the leg side
Aaron to Smith, FOUR runs full and wide, opens his bat face to place the square drive to the left of the point fielder
Aaron to Smith, no run Smith makes room now. He maybe shouldn't have, because Aaron bowls it so wide that he has to reach out a long way to slash, and ends up dragging it back to the bowler
Aaron to Smith, no run in the blockhole on off stump, stabbed away towards gully
Aaron to Smith, no run looks to bowl it full again, slants it outside leg
Aaron to Smith, FOUR runs back of a length wide of off stump, and he opens his bat face to steer it past the diving gully fielder
Sharma to Starc, no run and there's the bouncer again. Pretty well-directed, goes over his right shoulder after he fails to connect with the hook
Sharma to Starc, 3 runs full outside off, and Starc's front-foot stride is better than Johnson's. Gets close enough to the ball to drive it uppishly through mid-off
Sharma to Smith, no run short and wide, and he punches it off the back foot to the right of point
Sharma to Smith, no run good ball, big angle in, and Smith didn't come forward (does he ever?). Shuffled across to defend and it hit him on the pad, off the inside edge
Aaron to Starc, no run full, a bit of swing in towards middle stump. Goes for the big drive and misses, bounces up to hit him on the thigh
Aaron to Starc, no run full and wide, left alone
Aaron to Starc, no run short now, slanting away from Starc, who leaves again
Aaron to Starc, no run fuller now, fifth-stump line, left alone
Aaron to Starc, no run length ball outside off, straightens a touch and beats Starc's prod

Aaron to Starc, 3 runs back of a length outside off and he gets on top of the bounce with nice use of his wrists to steer that down towards third man. Pujara chases back from short cover, I think, and juuust pulls the ball back before his elbow hits the boundary cushions
Sharma to Starc, FOUR runs wide length ball. Starc throws his bat at it and slices it over backward point. Umesh, running to his left from third man, can't stop it with his foot
Sharma to Starc, FOUR runs length ball on off stump. Starc clears his front foot and smacks it down the ground, to the left of mid-off. He simply flat-batted that. Wasn't Johnson out a few overs ago?
Sharma to Starc, no run back of a length on off stump, defended towards mid-on
Sharma to Starc, no run bouncer now, angled across Starc, who can't connect with the hook
Sharma to Starc, 1 run banged in again, pulled from outside off to the left of mid-on. Didn't quite time it
Sharma to Lyon, no run full, speared down the leg side, and it bounces off Dhoni's gloves
Yadav to Starc, 2 runs full and wide, and that's driven with a wavy follow-through, uppishly to the right of mid-off
Yadav to Starc, no run put down Starc went hard at the full ball and smashed it straight back. Umesh stuck out his right hand, it didn't quite stick, and ricocheted onto the umpire
Yadav to Starc, FOUR runs short now, and Starc clears his front leg to smack the pull through midwicket
Yadav to Starc, no run length ball on a fourth-stump line, left alone
Yadav to Starc, 2 runs a little fuller and he drives it with an open face through square cover. Stepped inside the line to make some room
Yadav to Starc, FOUR runs quick bouncer and Starc isn't really in control of the pull. Flies away off the glove and beats long leg to his left
Aaron to Lyon, no run bouncer, Lyon ducks and it swings away after going over him
Aaron to Lyon, 2 runs fuller now, on middle stump. Lyon comes forward to drive, gets a thick inside edge down to fine leg. Umesh makes a tumbling stop running to his right from long leg
Aaron to Lyon, no run back of a length on off stump, defended into the covers off the back foot
Aaron to Lyon, no run bouncer, doesn't get up as much as Lyon expected as he ducks, and it hits him on the shoulder
Aaron to Lyon, no run another. This one rises higher and Lyon can duck safely under it

Aaron to Lyon, 3 runs fuller now, on middle stump. He's in a strange position, front leg crossed over, but manages to bring his bat down around it and clip it away down the ground, to the left of mid-on
Yadav to Lyon, no run length ball wide outside off, swings away to beat Lyon's swishing blade
Yadav to Lyon, FOUR runs full and wide and Lyon chases at it and gets a thick edge that flies over the slip cordon to the third man boundary
Yadav to Lyon, no run fullish outswinger outside off, driven to the right of the short extra cover fielder. Went off the bottom of the bat
Yadav to Lyon, FOUR runs on the pads now, and that is a lovely little glance to the fine leg boundary
Yadav to Lyon, no run full outside off, driven on the up to short extra cover
Yadav to Lyon, no run full and wide, nice wristy drive and short extra cover dives left to make the save
Ashwin to Starc, no run angled down the leg side, and it pops off the pad towards leg slip as Starc tries to whip it leg-side
Ashwin to Starc, 1 run fuller now, driven down to long-on
Ashwin to Lyon, no run looks to sweep a slow, tossed-up ball from wide outside off, is too early into his shot and it spins in to hit him on the shoulder
Ashwin to Lyon, no run back of a length now and he goes on the back foot to defend
Ashwin to Lyon, 1 run now he connects with the sweep, places it to the left of deep backward square leg
Ashwin to Starc, no run shortish, and he goes on the back foot to defend
Aaron to Lyon, 3 runs back of a length, too straight, and he flicks it off his hips in front of square on the leg side
Aaron to Starc, 1 wide another bouncer, and Dhoni has to leap and stretch his right arm way over his head to catch that after Starc moves his head away from the line
Aaron to Starc, FOUR runs short again, outside off, and he top-edges the pull over the gap between keeper and slip
Aaron to Starc, 1 leg bye full, angling down leg. Misses the flick and it pops off the pad into the off side
Aaron to Lyon, no run short ball outside off, and Lyon can't connect with the uppercut
Aaron to Lyon, no run back of a length over middle stump. Lyon jumps up to defend into the off side
Aaron to Lyon, 2 runs full now, punched down the ground to long-off
Ashwin to Starc, no run full on middle stump, and it goes with the angle and hits him on the pad as he looks to defend. Looked to be heading down the leg side
Ashwin to Starc, no run clears his front leg to go hard down the ground, nearly yorks himself as Ashwin spears it in full. Jams it down into the off side
Ashwin to Starc, no run a little wider and he drives it straight to cover
Ashwin to Starc, 1 run tossed up outside off, looks for the slog and can't connect as well as he'd like. Rolls down to long-on
Ashwin to Lyon, FOUR runs shot. That was tossed up on middle stump and Lyon clears his front leg to slog-sweep over midwicket
Ashwin to Lyon, no run down the leg side and he goes for the sweep. Bounces high and over his arm and ricochets off Dhoni's glove to leg slip, who makes a polite appeal for a catch
Aaron to Starc, 1 run in the blockhole and he jams his bat down to squeeze it away towards long leg
Aaron to Hazlewood, no run full, angling in towards off stump, defended off the front foot to short extra cover. Long time since I typed the word 'defended', I think
Aaron to Hazlewood, no run length ball, angled across. Poked with no footwork and the outside edge is beaten
Aaron to Hazlewood, no run short outside off, left alone
Aaron to Hazlewood, no run bouncer, and Hazlewood ducks safely under it
Ashwin to Starc, no run tossed up outside off. Comes forward to drive, bottom hand dominates to close the face and the leading edge bounces just short of extra cover
Ashwin to Starc, no run straighter line now and Starc defends off the front foot
Ashwin to Starc, 2 runs tossed up outside off again and he goes for the big slog, top-edges it high over the slip fielder
Ashwin to Starc, 1 run angled in towards off stump and it goes with the angle. Comes forward to push through mid-off, maybe, and gets a thick inside edge into the on side
Ashwin to Hazlewood, no run full on off stump, defended to mid-off
Ashwin to Hazlewood, no run full again, and he presses forward to block
Aaron to Starc, 1 run full outside off and Starc drives to extra cover

Aaron to Hazlewood, no run ooh, didn't carry. Pushed away from his body at the back of a length ball slanting away from him, and edges it low to the right of first slip. Ashwin dives, it bounces just in front of him. May have been Dhoni's catch, but he didn't go for it. It was quite close to him, but he simply didn't move, and just watched it through to Ashwin
Aaron to Hazlewood, no run similar delivery, thicker edge, goes downwards towards gully this time
Aaron to Hazlewood, no run a bit of shape in from leg and middle and it hits Starc high on the thigh as he looks to work it leg side
Aaron to Hazlewood, no run bouncer now, and Hazlewood ducks low under the ball

Aaron to Hazlewood, FOUR runs Length ball on middle and leg, clipped away through the vacant mid-on region and it runs away all the way to the boundary. All eleven Australians have struck boundaries in this innings
Ashwin to Starc, no run length ball, angling in towards middle stump, defended off the front foot
Ashwin to Starc, no run slower now, punched back to the bowler off the front foot
Ashwin to Starc, 1 run a touch too straight and he whips it away through midwicket
Ashwin to Hazlewood, 1 run floated up towards leg stump and he clears his front leg to drive towards long-off
Ashwin to Starc, 1 run full outside off and it's driven firmly, with a lot of bottom-hand, to long-off
Ashwin to Hazlewood, no run full, angled across, driven to short extra cover. Looked like the carrom ball, from the release
Sharma to Starc, 1 run short ball, he can't control the pull, and it pops up off the top edge. Drops between Ishant, trying to turn back from his follow-through, and Aaron, running in from mid-on
Sharma to Hazlewood, no run short outside off and it bounces over the edge as he looks to slash it away off the back foot
Sharma to Hazlewood, no run fuller now, angled across, and Hazlewood plays and misses. No footwork
Sharma to Hazlewood, no run another bouncer, and Hazlewood has to crouch really low to get under it
Sharma to Hazlewood, no run back of a length outside off, steered with an open face to point
Sharma to Hazlewood, no run back of a length on off stump, defended back towards the bowler
Ashwin to Starc, no run floated up outside off, and Starc slices the drive uppishly, bounces short of point
Ashwin to Starc, no run goes for the heave across the line. Loop and turn and it beats him completely
Ashwin to Starc, no run nice loop again and he defends to short cover
Ashwin to Starc, no run again, tossed up, turns from middle to off and he comes forward to block solidly
Ashwin to Starc, 2 runs down the leg side now and he goes on the back foot to work it away through midwicket
Ashwin to Starc, no run full, speared in towards off and middle, and he inside-edges into his pads looking to drive down the ground
Sharma to Hazlewood, no run bouncer, batsman ducks, Dhoni leaps to collect
Sharma to Hazlewood, no run and again
Sharma to Hazlewood, no run length ball on middle stump, clipped away to straight short midwicket
Sharma to Hazlewood, FOUR runs full on off stump, and Hazlewood does his Johnson/Starc impression, clears his front leg and smacks it down the ground, between the stumps and mid-off
Sharma to Hazlewood, FOUR runs and again, even better this time. Straight bat, full face, high elbow
Sharma to Hazlewood, no run back of a length over middle stump, defended off the back foot to short extra cover
Ashwin to Starc, no run tossed up on middle and off, defended back to the bowler
Ashwin to Starc, no run flatter now, driven hard back to the bowler
Ashwin to Starc, 1 run slower again and he reaches forward to nurdle it into the on side
Ashwin to Hazlewood, no run floated up, angled in towards middle and off, defended towards backward point
Ashwin to Hazlewood, FOUR runs shot! That was tossed up again and he accepts the invitation, clears his front leg and smashes it into the gap between short midwicket and mid-on
Ashwin to Hazlewood, FOUR runs it does, for the batsman. It's flighted outside off and he slices the drive away to the point boundary
Sharma to Starc, FOUR runs short, comes up waist-high, and Starc pulls it away contemptuously to the midwicket boundary

Sharma to Starc, 1 wide aaand again. It's a length ball on off stump, and he's too early into the attempted leg-side whip. Checks his shot and it pops up towards the midwicket area, wide of the bowler, nowhere near any other fielder
Sharma to Starc, 1 run Back of a length on off stump, defended into the off side. Took his bottom hand off to keep it down
Sharma to Hazlewood, no run Back of a length, angling across. Fended away towards point
Sharma to Hazlewood, no run short outside off, left alone
Sharma to Hazlewood, no run short again, and he sways away from the line. Not that he needed to, considering how wide it was
Sharma to Hazlewood, no run
Ashwin to Starc, no run appeal for lbw as he comes forward and looks to whip across the line. Looked like it pitched outside leg. Just in line, according to the pitch mat
Ashwin to Starc, no run full on off stump, driven back down the ground and Ashwin dives to his right in his follow-through to stop it
Ashwin to Starc, 1 run looked to drive again, and ends up inside-edging it past the keeper, towards fine leg. That takes him to his half-century
Ashwin to Hazlewood, FOUR runs bam. Now Hazlewood comes down the track, gets inside the line, and launches it over extra cover. Beautifully played
Ashwin to Hazlewood, no run On the pads now, tucked away towards short midwicket
Ashwin to Hazlewood, no run full on middle stump, defended back to the bowler
Yadav to Starc, no run length ball on middle stump, punched back to the bowler
Yadav to Starc, no run length ball on off stump, blocked back to the bowler
Yadav to Starc, 1 run back of a length now, on a fourth-stump line, pushed through cover point and that brings up Umesh's 100. All four Indian specialist bowlers have centuries now
Yadav to Hazlewood, no run a touch straighter in line, defended to short cover
Yadav to Hazlewood, no run full outside off, driven to mid-off
Yadav to Hazlewood, 1 run full, angling across, Hazlewood plays a checked drive to the right of mid-off
Ashwin to Hazlewood, no run back of a length on middle stump, worked towards square leg
Ashwin to Hazlewood, no run fuller now and he swipes it down to mid-on
Ashwin to Hazlewood, no run tossed up outside off, smacked back towards the bowler on the bounce
Ashwin to Hazlewood, FOUR runs angled in now and he slogs across the line, inside-edges it past the stumps and brings up Australia's 500
Ashwin to Hazlewood, 1 run down the track, slogged away to the left of mid-on
Ashwin to Starc, no run tossed up on off stump, defended to silly point off the front foot
Yadav to Hazlewood, no run length ball close to off stump, and the angle beats Hazlewood's half-forward prod
Yadav to Hazlewood, no run length ball outside off, defended back to the bowler
Yadav to Hazlewood, no run back of a length on leg stump, defended off the back foot into the on side
Yadav to Hazlewood, no run length ball on a fourth-stump line, blocked back to the bowler
Yadav to Hazlewood, no run full outside off, driven to extra cover
Yadav to Hazlewood, no run slower ball outside off, driven towards extra cover
Ashwin to Starc, 1 run tossed up outside off, driven into the covers
Ashwin to Hazlewood, no run full on off stump, defended back to the bowler
Ashwin to Hazlewood, 1 run down the track now, looks for the big slog over the leg side and ends up inside-edging into his pads, rolls away between his legs and past the keeper

3.32pm India have run through the tail in a hurry. It took them just four balls. Oh. Australia lead by 98. Whoda thunk it, given the position they were in after the first hour. The lower-order has batted brilliantly, and India have bowled awfully. There's no other way to put it, is there?
Innings Start

2.05pm Warner and Rogers are out in the middle. Ashwin gives Warner a pat on the back, and Warner pats Ashwin back on his back. Lots of backs in there. Who's coming in with the new ball, to bend his back? It's Ishant.
